main_content: Lab Director Contact Information Call: +1 (407) 823-6205 Email: Shaurya.Agarwal [at] ucf.edu Dr. Shaurya Agarwal Dr. Agarwal is currently (2024–present) an Associate Professor (with tenure) in the Civil, Environmental, and Construction Engineering Department at the University of Central Florida.
